Browsing the Wave Repository

If the editor is not running, relaunch the editor as you did in the Quick Start page.

Click on the first tab labeled somthing like "wavebase".

The wavetables used by the Mobileer Synthesizer are extracted from WAV and AIFF files that are stored in a folder. When the editor opens it automatically scans the folder and finds all the files in the hierarchy. You can place your own WAV or AIF files in this folder and they will automatically be appear in this display the next time you run the editor. You can browse the folder using a tree view.

Open a folder by clicking on the plus icon to the right of a folder name. Open folders until you see something like this:

You can extract one or more WaveTables from a single WAV or AIFF file. The original file is not modified by this process.

Open the "Clarinet" folder and then open the double Clarinet_64.aif" folder. Then double click on the "Clarinet_64_1" file.
